Personal_Force_Field.help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through. The Personal Force Field works both ways; while it is active, you can only use powers that affect yourself. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow
Personal_Force_Field.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} makes you virtually invulnerable to most attacks, but you can only cast powers on yourself while the Force Field is active.

Force_Bolt.help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Deflection_Shield.help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal and all Melee attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage. You cannot stack multiple Deflection Shields on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Insulation Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Deflection_Shield.targetHelp: You have been encased in a Deflection Shield. Your Defense to Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks is increased, and your ability to resist Toxic attacks is increased as well.
Deflection_Shield.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks, as well as Toxic Damage, with your {PowerName}.
Deflection_Shield.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Smashing, Lethal and Melee attacks with a {PowerName} and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

Detention_Field.help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid their allies. The target can, however, use powers on themselves. Recharge: Slow
Detention_Field.targetHelp: You have been captured in a Detention Field. You cannot be harmed, however, you can only use powers which affect yourself.

messages.attackerHit: You encase {PlayerDest} in an impenetrable {PowerName}. They cannot move and can only affect themselves now.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} encases you in an impenetrable {PowerName}. You cannot move and can only affect yourself!

Aid_Self.help: Allows you to heal yourself. This hypo also leaves you wide awake, and resistant to Disorientation effects. This power is interruptible. You must be at least level 14 and have Aid Other or Stimulant before selecting Aid Self.

messages.victimHit: You heal yourself for {Damage} hit points with {PowerName}. You are resistant to Disorient.

Dispersion_Bubble.help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attack types. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Dispersion_Bubble.targetHelp: The Dispersion Bubble is increasing your Defenses to all attacks and providing protection from Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting attacks.
Dispersion_Bubble.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from all damage types with your {PowerName}.
Dispersion_Bubble.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from all damage types with a {PowerName}.

Repulsion_Bomb.help: Projects an expanding Force Bubble around an ally that knocks down and Disorients nearby foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Repulsion_Bomb.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Foe Knockdown, Disorient, Damage Moderate (Smash)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Force_Bubble.help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, this power keeps all foes at bay, protecting all allies inside from melee or short ranged attacks. More powerful foes may be able to penetrate the Force Bubble, but may slip and get knocked down and forced back if they try. Recharge: Slow
Force_Bubble.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} keeps your foes at bay.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
